goal.ch: 本課程是為半年制研究生設計的。我們從回顧測度理論開始，介紹 Borel-Cantelli 引理，大數定律，Martingle等。目的是為在工作中運用概率的人們提供許多重要的想法和思考。
goal.en: "This course is designed for a half year graduate student. We start with reviewing measure theory and introduce Borel-Cantelli lemma, Law of large number, Martingle and so on. The aim is to provide many important ideas and thinking for people who apply probability in their work."

outline.ch: "1. Review: Lebesque-Stieltjes measures and Caratheodory extension theorems 2. Review: Integration  3. Probability spaces and sigma-algebras 4. Random variables and distributions 5. Laws of large numbers and independence6. Weak laws of large numbers 7. Midterm exam8. Borel-Cantelli lemmas and Strong Laws of Large Numbers: Colivenko-Cantelli theorem and Central limit theorem 9. Zero-one laws and maximal inequalities 10. Independent sums and larges deviations 11. De Moivre-Laplace theorem, weak convergence and characteristic functions12. Central limit theorem and its variants13. Random walks: stopping times and recurrence 14. Random walks: renewal theory 15. Martingales and Radon-Nikodym derivatives 16. Final exam"
